backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor for the NurPay wallet backend, defining types and state for users, transactions, notifications, support tickets, and app settings, with access control and blob storage mixins included.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping implemented features (PWA support, icon assets, install banner) to their associated files, components, test IDs, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-formatted summaries of all frontend source files, describing the purpose of each page, component, hook, and utility in the React app.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS stylesheet defining CSS custom properties for light and dark theme color tokens used throughout the app.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the React app with PWA meta tags, manifest link, Apple touch icon, and inline service worker registration script.
frontend/public/manifest.json: PWA web app manifest for BDT NURPAY WALLET specifying app name, theme colors, standalone display, portrait orientation, and 192x192/512x512 icon entries.
frontend/public/sw.js: Service worker implementing cache-first for static assets and network-first for navigation and API calls, with versioned caches and bypass rules for admin routes and ICP backend endpoints.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Defines the full client-side router using TanStack Router with all app routes (auth, transactions, admin, profile) and wraps the app in a QueryClientProvider and Toaster.
frontend/src/components/AnnouncementMarq: Renders a horizontally scrolling marquee banner displaying a list of announcement strings with a 'Notice' label and megaphone icon.
frontend/src/components/AppHeader.tsx: Sticky top header showing the NuroPay logo and user greeting, or a back button with title; includes a notification bell with unread count badge.
frontend/src/components/BalanceCard.tsx: Displays the user's account balance, name, and mobile number in a styled gradient card with a toggle to show or hide the balance.
frontend/src/components/BottomNav.tsx: Fixed bottom navigation bar with Home, History, Notifications, and Profile tabs; highlights the active route and shows an unread notification badge.
frontend/src/components/ConfirmationModa: A dialog modal that displays transaction details and total amount for user review, with Cancel and Confirm buttons and a loading state.
frontend/src/components/InstallBanner.ts: Shows a dismissible PWA install prompt banner using the usePWAInstall hook; hidden if already installed or dismissed.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Simple layout wrapper that renders children inside an app container and optionally includes the BottomNav component.
frontend/src/components/NotificationItem: Renders a single notification as a clickable card with read/unread styling, title, body, timestamp, and a mark-as-read callback.
frontend/src/components/PhotoUpload.tsx: File input component for uploading a photo (e.g., KYC), showing a preview with a remove button or a dashed placeholder with camera icon.
frontend/src/components/ProcessingScreen: Full-screen loading indicator with a spinning loader, 'Processing' heading, a custom message, and animated pulsing dots.
frontend/src/components/ServiceGrid.tsx: Renders a 3-column grid of service shortcut buttons (Send Money, Recharge, etc.) each navigating to the corresponding route.
frontend/src/components/TransactionListI: Renders a single transaction as a clickable list item with type-specific icons, colored backgrounds, amount (incoming/outgoing), recipient/provider, and a status badge with icon.
Displays a printable transaction receipt card showing type, amount, status, and details (ID, date, recipient/provider) with Save Slip and Done action buttons.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and caches an ICP backend actor (anonymous or authenticated) using React Query, and invalidates dependent queries whenever the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an Internet Identity authentication context and hook, managing AuthClient creation, login/logout flow, identity persistence, and login status states.
frontend/src/hooks/usePWAInstall.ts: Hook that tracks PWA installability by capturing the beforeinstallprompt event, exposes installApp and dismissPrompt helpers, and persists dismissed state in sessionStorage.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Centralizes React Query hooks for backend interactions including user profile fetching, registration, login, transaction CRUD, and notification queries/mutations via the actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Global stylesheet defining Tailwind base/utilities, OKLCH CSS custom properties for the NuroPay green theme (light/dark), and utility classes for shadows, gradients, status badges, animations, and layout.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Entry point that renders the React app wrapped in QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminDashboardP: Main admin dashboard with tabbed navigation covering stats, transaction control, user management, transaction management, notifications, and support tickets, protected by admin auth check.
Admin login page that validates hardcoded credentials, generates a token, and redirects to the admin dashboard on success.
frontend/src/pages/HistoryPage.tsx: Displays a sorted list of user transactions with loading skeletons and a detail view via TransactionSlip on item click.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Main dashboard showing the user's balance, a grid of service shortcuts (send, recharge, etc.), and header actions for notifications, profile, and logout.
frontend/src/pages/KYCPage.tsx: KYC submission form with NID, name, address, and photo upload fields, plus status banners for approved/pending/rejected states.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Login and registration page with tabbed forms for mobile/PIN authentication and new account creation.
frontend/src/pages/NotificationsPage.tsx: Lists user notifications sorted by date with skeleton loading and marks individual notifications as read on interaction.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilePage.tsx: Profile page with sections for PIN change, biometric toggle, support ticket creation/history, and an FAQ accordion.
frontend/src/pages/transactions/AddMoney: Thin wrapper around TransactionPage configured for the addMoney transaction type with source provider and account number fields.
frontend/src/pages/transactions/BankTran: Thin wrapper around TransactionPage configured for bankTransfer with bank name, account number, and routing number fields.
frontend/src/pages/transactions/CashOutP: Thin wrapper around TransactionPage configured for cashOut with mobile wallet provider and account number fields.
frontend/src/pages/transactions/PayBillP: Thin wrapper around TransactionPage configured for payBill with biller name and bill account number fields.
frontend/src/pages/transactions/Recharge: Thin wrapper around TransactionPage configured for mobile recharge with phone number and operator selection fields.
frontend/src/pages/transactions/SavingsP: Thin wrapper around TransactionPage configured for savings with plan duration and purpose/note fields.
frontend/src/pages/transactions/SendMone: Thin wrapper around TransactionPage configured for sendMoney with a single recipient mobile number field.
frontend/src/pages/transactions/Transact: Generic multi-step transaction page (form → confirm → processing → slip) that validates KYC/balance, submits transactions via API, and updates local balance state.
frontend/src/store/authStore.ts: Zustand store managing authenticated user state (id, name, mobile, balance, KYC status) with localStorage session persistence and login/logout actions.
frontend/src/utils/adminAuth.ts: Utility functions for admin authentication using hardcoded credentials stored as a plain-text token in localStorage.
frontend/src/utils/deviceFingerprint.ts: Generates and persists a browser-based device fingerprint using a hash of navigator/screen properties stored in localStorage.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for extracting, persisting, and clearing URL parameters from both query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage fallback support.
frontend/src/utils/validation.ts: Validation helpers for Bangladeshi mobile numbers, PINs, and NID numbers, plus formatting utilities for BDT currency and nanosecond timestamps.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining a custom design system with OKLCH color tokens, extended typography/shadow/animation utilities, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project state snapshot (version 11) describing the BDT NURPAY WALLET app's current features, architectural decisions, known bugs, color theme, admin credentials, and image requirements.
